parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> A non-existing [[Control]]. To compare non-existent objects use [[isNull]] or [[isEqualTo]] (see examples).

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[controlNull]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Control]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] (_myCtrl [[isEqualTo]] [[controllNull]]) [[then]] { [[hint]] "_myCtrl is null!"; };</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[controlNull]] == [[controlNull]];			<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>returns [[false]]</value></part></template>
[[isNull]] [[controlNull]];						<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>returns [[true]]</value></part></template>
[[controlNull]] [[isEqualTo]] [[controlNull]];		<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>returns [[true]]</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> <code>[[str]] [[controlNull]]; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>No control</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[displayNull]], [[grpNull]], [[locationNull]], [[objNull]], [[taskNull]], [[teamMemberNull]], [[scriptNull]], [[configNull]], [[typeName]], [[isNull]]
</value></part></template>
